{{CompexEoL}}
===Specifications derived from the datasheet=== Additional specifications, per '''Compex''''s datasheet, follows...
'''RF Output Power (all +1.0/-1.5 dB)''' *802.11a, 6-24Mbps, 17 dBm *802.11a, 36Mbps, 16 dBm *802.11a, 48Mbps, 14 dBm *802.11a, 54Mbps, 13 dBm *802.11b, 1-11Mbps, 17 dBm *802.11g, 6-36Mbps, 17 dBm *802.11g, 48Mbps, 16 dBm *802.11a, 54Mbps, 15 dBm
{{802dot11 RxSens|11a |6M=-95 |54M=-72 }} {{802dot11 RxSens|11b |11M=-92 }} {{802dot11 RxSens|11g |6M=-95 |54M=-72 }} :<small>All Rx. sens. values have a +- 2 dB tolerance!</small>
